mapper.select: select * from dictionarybean where dict_type=#{dictType} and dict_value=#{dictValue}
mapper.insert: insert into dictionarybean (dict_type, dict_name, dict_value, display_order, dict_desc) values (#{dictType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dictDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
